member.name: T:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone
member.summary: Provides methods to generate POSIX time zone strings.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromTimeZoneInfo(System.TimeZoneInfo)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from a object, for the current year. Note - only uses only the property from the object.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromTimeZoneInfo(System.TimeZoneInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from a object, for the given year. Note - only uses only the property from the object.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromWindowsTimeZoneId(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from a Windows time zone ID, for the current year.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromWindowsTimeZoneId(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from a Windows time zone ID, for the given year.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromIanaTimeZoneName(System.String)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from an IANA time zone name, for the current year.

member.name: M:TimeZoneConverter.Posix.PosixTimeZone.FromIanaTimeZoneName(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Generates a POSIX time zone string from an IANA time zone name, for the given year.
